name: DigiScape
description:
The Digit-Devils are ready to invade the Outer World. Kill their leader and become the hero who saves the Outer World.

How to play?

Movement - WASD

Shoot - Space

Pause Menu - P

Credits

To all the wonderful who supported us during our time of creation, thank you. We appreciate you.

To the player

As always we hope you will enjoy the game. Leave a comment or a criticism, we appreciate both.

Yours truly

Ors373, The GamerUrso and Rona Hattingh

[This is a game entry for Game Dev 101 Jam]
